name: Postal Logger
author: Don Kukral

sections.description:
Used to log postal codes of users coming to your blog.

sections.installation:
Copy “postal-logger” folder to your WordPress Plugins Directory.
Activate plugin via WordPress settings.
sections.changelog:
1.2

Verified compatibility with WP 4.0

1.1

Verified compatibility with WP 3.9.1

1.0

Added license and copyright information

0.1.3

Fixing bug that hardcoded the geo lookup

0.1.2

Added reset feature
Filtered out bots
Limited display to top 20 postal codes and cities

0.1.1

Minor typo fix

0.1

Added city logging

0.0

Initial Version
